page.title: 09CHILDREN'S READING.
page.content:
Two of the favourite authors of the children in our school are Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl. "The B.F.G." is a popular Dahl book and the Famous Five books were popular with Blyton readers.
Books which have been filmed for the cinema are popular amongst the older children: "Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom" and "Ghostbusters" being topical examples. Horror and adventure stories are also well-liked.
Most of the pupils read for about one hour a day at home, generally in their bedroom at night. The young children in our school learn to read using very humourous books about a king and queen who live in a palace with guards, servants, and a very noisy baby.
